titleStmt.title: An act disabling the election of divers persons to any office or place of trust within the city of London, and the votes of such persons in such elections.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iohn Field for Edward Husband, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print dated 14 Dec. 1649.
Caption title; ornament above caption; inital letter; text in black letter.
Signatures: 6A² . Also issued as part of a through-paged set with a table for the entire set added.
Last word of first line of text: "England"; first word of line below initial: "King"; last word of last full line on page: "thousand".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
